name: David Ariew X Tatler China Certificate of Appreciation

metadata.name: David Ariew X Tatler China: Certificate of Appreciation
metadata.description:
A certificate of appreciation for collectors of David Ariew X Tatler China: The Philanthropic Journey of an NFT Artwork. TRLab was honored to facilitate the sale of the artwork, Fractal Monarch, where half of the sale proceeds was donated to global nonprofit organization Save The Children Hong Kong. 

The original artwork represents the butterfly effect, symbolizing how a small contribution can make a large impact on a child's future. This certificate was created to express sincere gratitude to the collectors who participated in the primary purchase of Fractal Monarch, thanking them for the donation that will go on to make a life-changing impact with Save The Children.
